content: अभ्युपपत्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Approaching to assist, taking pity or compassion on, favouring; a favour, kindness; अभ्युपपत्त्या अस्या जीवितमवलंबस्व <ls>Ś. 3</ls>; अनयाभ्युपपत्त्या <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; मम° निमित्तं <ls>Mk. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Consolation. {@--3@} Protection, defence; ब्राह्मणाभ्युपपत्तौ च शपथे नास्ति पातकं <ls>Ms. 8. 112</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">349</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">10. 62</ls>; आर्त° <ls>Dk. 39.</ls> {@--4@} An agreement, assent, promise. {@--5@} Impregnation of a woman (especially of a brother's widow as an act of duty).
